downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Customer Returns
downloadDescription: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 introduces a dedicated module for handling customer returns. Built on the sales order framework, the return order module allows for handling customer returns in a controlled and efficient manner.
detailsSection:
Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 introduces a dedicated process for handling customer returns. This dedicated process has a new document type—the Return order—that is built as a specialization of the sales order. The process specifies a number of steps for receiving, inspecting, and disposing of returned items. This document includes detailed descriptions of:
  • Supported processes and scenarios
  • Important variations to scenarios
  • Effect on inventory costing and on-hand
  • Setup and configuration of the return order module
  • Reporting and statistics
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the file in PDF format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
  3. Repeat these steps on each computer where you want to install the file, or save the file to a shared folder where other others can access it.
